name: Twin Bodies
description:
Climb the sky as two bodies tied together by a rope. 10-20 minutes

Escape to pause

M to mute

Hold LMB/A/Left to grab with the pink body

Hold RMB/D/Right to grab with the blue body

Hold W/Up to make the rope longer and spin slower

Hold S/Down to make the rope shorter and spin faster

Inspired by an old DS game.

Credits:

Game made by Sunny Caughey in under 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: Joined Together

Using:

Game engine: Godot
Art program: Paint.net

Sound effect program: Bfxr

Free assets used:

Font: Dogica by Roberto Mocci

Music: Going Higher by Bensound

Music: Memories by Bensound
